titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 120-piece drill and driver bit sets for woodworking.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 120-piece drill and driver bit sets for woodworking.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 120-piece drill and driver bit sets for woodworking.
